description:
An intuitive diagram software with templates for any scenario.

EdrawMax is a powerful, all-in-one, and yet easy-to-use diagramming tool that enables users to visualize the ideas effortlessly. With EdrawMax, you can create and customize flowcharts, Venn diagrams, mind maps, organizational charts, Gantt charts, UML diagrams, electrical drawings, genograms, building plans, etc.
1. Floor plans now show both interior and exterior wall dimensions.
2. Easily copy mind maps from MindMaster and paste them into EdrawMax in their original format.
3. You can now set how often updates happen, just the way you like.
4. When you create a new blank file, a variety of templates are ready at the bottom of the canvas.
5. Other experience optimizations and bug fixes.
